name: Growth Essentials Rosemary Hair Growth Pomade
description:
Nourish your scalp with this rich blend of coconut oil, jojoba oil, emu oil, sulfur, and rosemary oil. Your hair will thank you by growing longer and stronger.

Coconut Oil: a light oil that penetrates the hair and helps to prevent protein loss.

Jojoba Oil: a liquid wax that closely matches our natural sebum.

Emu Oil: an anti-inflammatory agent that stimulates the hair's natural growing ability.

Sulfur: keeps the hair cells alive and forms new healthy cells.

Rosemary Oil: an essential oil that fights against hair loss, and reduces dry and flaky scalps.

Do you want your pomade to be sulfur-free? Send me a message or state your request in the notes section at checkout, and I'll happily oblige.

name: Growth Foundations Peppermint Hair Growth Pomade, 4 oz.
description:
Nourish your scalp with this calming blend of coconut oil, castor oil, emu oil, sulfur, and peppermint oil. Your hair will thank you by growing longer and stronger.

Coconut Oil: a light oil that penetrates the hair and helps to prevent protein loss.

Castor Oil: an anti-fungal and anti-bacterial oil that stimulates hair growth.

Emu Oil: an anti-inflammatory agent that stimulates the hair's natural growing ability.

Sulfur: keeps the hair cells alive and forms new healthy cells.

Peppermint Oil: a nutrient-rich essential oil that stimulates the scalp.

Do you want your pomade to be sulfur-free? Send me a message or state your request in the notes section at checkout, and I'll happily oblige.
